column17:
Product Description

LEAVE ON HAIR CREME It's a next generation hair therapy with active UV protection. This hair cream is a two phase system with effects of silicones humectants protein vitamin essential oils and water. It is specially formulated to give your hair an instant wet shine without leaving them feeling oily or sticky. It produces this effect even on dry hair without adding any extra water. It also fights hair fall and early greying of hair
